channel.title: Need help with my client pleease
channel.description:
well i was adding some model ids for silab items i added in class.8 where it should be i put team 9 cape tos how up as attk cape on client but when i spawn it i get this error
Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 19047 at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method462(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:125) at Class8.method201(Class8.java:735) at Class8.method200(Class8.java:607) at client.method105(client.java:8091) at client.method105(client.java:8062) at client.method112(client.java:8743) at client.method146(client.java:11934) at client.method102(client.java:7786) at client.method9(client.java:8667) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126) at client.run(client.java:4434) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
any1 help me fix this?its probably nooby loolz im new to clients

item.title: Need help with my client pleease
item.dc:creator: @barrage_pker barrage pker
item.description:
@barrage_pker wrote:

lol i dnt even have a client compiler lmfao i just copied from my server[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 01, 2007, 02:19:06 PM[/size][hr]man qwerty i still get the trade error

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with my client pleease
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

And weren’t you told that you should change your misleading signature?
Lol.

And he doesn’t have to make a serparate compiler.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my client pleease

item.title: Need help with my client pleease
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

You go in the signlink file in your client files and then theres a compiler there and you click the compiler and compile then you compile he rest of the files… then run.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my client pleease

item.title: Need help with my client pleease
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

Just add this to the compiler in your folder.

javac sign\signlink.java

And as for the crashing problem, I’ll try to help you by making it catch the exception that’s thrown when you see an item like that.
Just a second.

Found it.
Change

aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_183.anInt1406 = anIntArray195[i];

to

try { aClass30_Sub2_Sub2_183.anInt1406 = anIntArray195[i]; } catch(Exception whatever) { }

No more crashes.

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my client pleease

item.title: Need help with my client pleease
item.dc:creator: @barrage_pker barrage pker
item.description:
@barrage_pker wrote:

ok if i remove class8.anInt174 = 19047; wouldnt it make me crash anyway because if its in my inventory i wont see it and how do i compile the signlink?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my client pleease

item.title: Need help with my client pleease
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:4, topic:161875”][quote author=dragonchain link=topic=220254.msg1908598#msg1908598 date=1196555883]
First you need to compile the signlink… then you compile on the regular files then you run…
[/quote]

That’s not the problem, this guy’s probably never dealt with a client before.[/quote]That may be the the problem… if they havn’t compiled signlink or the files… it won’t work… because I had expirence with clients before… and I got that error long time ago when I was just starting then I learned about the signlink then I went in there and compiled then compiled all the files then ran and it worked… and when I didn’t compile the same error he has came up.

Read full topic
